full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I DMAR KHRID THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR BGROD PA'I BDE LAM GYI SNYAN RGYUD THUN MONG MIN PA'I KHRID RGYUN GSOL 'DEBS MDOR BSDUS BYA BA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHU LU GA CHOS 'KHOR LHA SAR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN STONG PHRAG BRGAL BAR LAM RIM BDE @004B LAM GYI KHRID RGYAS PAR BYAS SKABS TSOGS 'DON MDZAD RGYUR, ,DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS LHA LDAN SPRUL PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
